title: Never Ever After
description: The #1 series for Dysfunctional Relationships as shown on the Amazon top 100 (July 2013).This is a story of choices. Everyday we make a choice, we make a few, ever made a decision that you came to regret?From a woman who is desperate for redemption and a man who wants to escape the shadows and find out whats behind the mask comes Never Ever After.
author: Mercy Cortez
